summary: A collection of command‑line utilities and helper modules for a duplex text‑normalization system. It supports training the tagger and decoder components, running inference in batch or interactive mode, evaluating models on test sets, and generating interactive error‑analysis reports, all configurable via YAML/Hydra.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to build, evaluate, and deploy robust text‑normalization pipelines that convert written text to spoken form (and vice versa) across multiple languages, improving downstream speech‑recognition and text‑to‑speech applications.
